name: Stichting Internations Exchange
goal: InterNations Exchange supports minorities, nations and peoples in their advocacy for greater cultural, political and economic self-dtermination.
interests: European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development
euInitiatives: We follow the activities of the committees that relate to issues affecting the minorities which the foundation supports. Furthermore, we interact with the relevant MEPâ€™s in order to inform them of the plight of these communities and provide them up to date and relevant information. The committees the foundation actively follows are those involved in foreign affairs (AFET and DROI and SEDE) as well as international trade (INTA) and development (DEVE).
